title: Group portrait of St. Brigid kindergarten graduates, first row from left: Denice [Denise?] Turner, Bernadete [Bernadette?] Stanley, Cecilia Goines [Gaines?], Anita Holley, June Collins, Debra Green, Cornell Lee, Rock Lee Leonard, Christopher Thompson, and Jewel McCallister; second row: Walter Barton, Alda White, Juanita Thompson, Carlotte Greene, La San Owens, Irene Pinnick, Emmet [Emmett] Pratt, Vernon Brown, James Durham, and Daryl Mitchell, third row: Darnell Mitchell, Judith Sims, Louis Mc Callister, Justine Collins, Charmaine Johnson, Freddie Molder, Leonard Howard, Pierre Blackwell, Quince Reynolds, and Shawna Robinson; fourth row: Father Paul Bassompierre, Alberta Page, Sister Rose Elizabeth, and Father John La Bauve, posed on steps of Holy Trinity Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
